snippet.title: Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island! An all-new Shiren the Wanderer game is coming to the West on Nintendo Switch on February 27, 2024.

Shiren the Wanderer and his companion, Koppa the talking ferret, return for a new roguelike dungeon-crawling adventure on Serpentcoil Island.

Rise, and rise again. Take Shiren to new heights! 

Website: https://www.spike-chunsoft.com/games/shiren-the-wanderer-the-mystery-dungeon-of-serpentcoil-island/

#Shiren #roguelike #NintendoSwitch
